message: Let's split fairly, considering my advantage in keeping value
I understand your position, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile for me given the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my offer is quite generous, think twice before rejecting
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option, especially considering the inflation we're both facing.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you another chance to accept a reasonable split
Alice, let's be realistic. We both lose if this goes on. I'm offering a compromise. Take it before the inflation eats away even more of my share.
You're right, we both lose if this goes on. But I'm not willing to give up my advantage. This is my most generous offer yet
